title: Analyze Guest Feedback Trends
description: A general manager wants to analyze guest feedback from the past quarter to identify common themes or recurring issues.

tasks.description: Generate a report from the guest feedback platform for the previous quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report containing all survey responses and online reviews is generated.

tasks.description: Use text analytics to identify the most frequently mentioned keywords and topics.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows that 'slow check-in' and 'breakfast variety' are common negative themes.

tasks.description: Create a summary presentation of the findings to share with department heads.
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear, concise presentation is created to drive operational improvements.
